My trip on this Friday began at 12:10 p.m. , walking out the door of my South Arlington condo to catch a Metrobus to the Pentagon , where I connected to the train that took me to the airport .
Getting through security took me a not - atypical 12 minutes .
It 's not so much a gate as a pass - through , where a bus takes you to the planes that are too numerous to all be connected to the terminal via the jet bridge .
I 'm hot and feeling more than a little claustrophobic .
The shuttle operators keep opening every door as each new arrival tries to board , squeezing into any available open space .
